title: Answer me on my question riot!
body:
Look,this is old,but i verify my e-mail and u didn't answer me on my question...why,i just want my mistery gitf what i deserve...really ty riot for that,*i trusted you!!!!*
And i asked you on riot support so answer me ffs :(

replies.body: I was going to suggest reaching out to us in a ticket so we can help, but it looks like you've already done that.  Your ticket has been received, and a specialist can look into this for you as soon as possible.  Hang tight until then!
